languages.text: "Эмелина использовала силы Хаоса, чтобы совладать с ксеносами. Я прикоснулся к когитатору, сотворенному культистами, чтобы постичь его тайны. Никто из нас не чист. Ксавьер..." {n}Хейнрикс запинается. А потом начинает говорить, очень, очень тщательно выбирая слова.{/n} "Малодушные говорят, что каждый инквизитор заканчивает свою карьеру гибелью или клеймением еретиком. Лорд-инквизитор в этом ремесле дольше любого из нас. Наивно считать, что он всегда пользовался только пуританскими методами — и не менее наивно думать, что его методы сколь сколько-то поколебали его верность Богу-Императору. На этом — закроем эту тему".

traits.locale_text: "Эмилина использовала силы Хаоса, чтобы совладать с ксеносами. Я прикоснулся к когитатору, сотворенному культистами, чтобы постичь его тайны. Никто из нас не чист. Ксавьер..." {n}Хейнрикс запинается. А потом начинает говорить, очень, очень тщательно выбирая слова.{/n} "Малодушные говорят, что каждый инквизитор заканчивает свою карьеру гибелью или клеймением еретиком. Лорд-инквизитор в этом ремесле дольше любого из нас. Наивно считать, что он всегда пользовался только пуританскими методами — и не менее наивно думать, что его методы сколь сколько-то поколебали его верность Богу-Императору. На этом — закроем эту тему".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Emelina used the powers of Chaos to gain the upper hand against xenos. I touched a cogitator built by cultists to learn its secrets. None of us is pure. Xavier..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, and then resumes speaking, now choosing his words with extreme care.{/n} "The craven-hearted say that the career of every Inquisitor ends in either death or heresy. The Lord Inquisitor has borne this burden longer than any of us. It would be naive to think that he had only ever used puritan methods — and even more naive to suggest that such methods have in any way weakened his loyalty to the God-Emperor. And that is all I will say on the subject."

languages.text: «Emelina usó los poderes del Caos para aventajar a los xenos. Toqué un cogitador fabricado por sectarios para ahondar en sus secretos. Ninguno de nosotros es puro. Xavier...». {n}Heinrix titubea, y luego continúa hablando escogiendo sus palabras con extrema cautela.{/n} «Los cobardes dicen que la labor de todo inquisidor culmina en muerte o herejía. El Lord Inquisidor ha soportado esta carga mucho más que cualquiera de nosotros. Sería una ingenuidad pensar que únicamente ha empleado métodos puritanos, y aún más ingenuo sugerir que tales métodos hayan mermado su lealtad al Dios Emperador. Y eso es todo cuanto diré al respecto».
languages.original_text: "Emelina used the powers of Chaos to gain the upper hand against xenos. I touched a cogitator built by cultists to learn its secrets. None of us is pure. Xavier..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, and then resumes speaking, now choosing his words with extreme care.{/n} "The craven-hearted say that the career of every Inquisitor ends in either death or heresy. The Lord Inquisitor has borne this burden longer than any of us. It would be naive to think that he had only ever used puritan methods — and even more naive to suggest that such methods have in any way weakened his loyalty to the God-Emperor. And that is all I will say on the subject."

traits.locale_text: «Emelina usó los poderes del Caos para aventajar a los xenos. Toqué un cogitador fabricado por sectarios para ahondar en sus secretos. Ninguno de nosotros es puro. Xavier...». {n}Heinrix titubea, y luego continúa hablando escogiendo sus palabras con extrema cautela.{/n} «Los cobardes dicen que la labor de todo inquisidor culmina en muerte o herejía. El Lord Inquisidor ha soportado esta carga mucho más que cualquiera de nosotros. Sería una ingenuidad pensar que únicamente ha empleado métodos puritanos, y aún más ingenuo sugerir que tales métodos hayan mermado su lealtad al Dios Emperador. Y eso es todo cuanto diré al respecto».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「エメリナは異種族より優位に立つため、渾沌の力を利用した。俺は魔女団が製造した考算機に触れて、奴らの秘密を知ろうとした。純潔な者は誰一人いない。ザビエルは…」{n}ハインリックスは躊躇した後、言葉を慎重に選びながら話し始めた。{/n}「すべての異端審問官のキャリアは死か異端で終わると、臆病な者たちは言う。ロード・インクィジターは我々の誰よりも長くこの重責を担ってきた。彼が清教主義的な方法しか用いなかったと考えるのは甘すぎるし、そのような方法をとったことで神帝陛下への忠誠心が少しでも弱まったと考えるのはさらに甘い。この件について俺から言えることはこれだけだ」
languages.original_text: "Emelina used the powers of Chaos to gain the upper hand against xenos. I touched a cogitator built by cultists to learn its secrets. None of us is pure. Xavier..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, and then resumes speaking, now choosing his words with extreme care.{/n} "The craven-hearted say that the career of every Inquisitor ends in either death or heresy. The Lord Inquisitor has borne this burden longer than any of us. It would be naive to think that he had only ever used puritan methods — and even more naive to suggest that such methods have in any way weakened his loyalty to the God-Emperor. And that is all I will say on the subject."

traits.locale_text: 「エメリナは異種族より優位に立つため、渾沌の力を利用した。俺は魔女団が製造した考算機に触れて、奴らの秘密を知ろうとした。純潔な者は誰一人いない。ザビエルは…」{n}ハインリックスは躊躇した後、言葉を慎重に選びながら話し始めた。{/n}「すべての異端審問官のキャリアは死か異端で終わると、臆病な者たちは言う。ロード・インクィジターは我々の誰よりも長くこの重責を担ってきた。彼が清教主義的な方法しか用いなかったと考えるのは甘すぎるし、そのような方法をとったことで神帝陛下への忠誠心が少しでも弱まったと考えるのはさらに甘い。この件について俺から言えることはこれだけだ」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “艾米莉娜为了战胜异形，利用了混沌的力量。而我触碰过一台由邪教徒制造的沉思者，以获取其中的秘密。我们都不是纯洁之人，至于希维尔……”{n}海因里希犹豫片刻，小心翼翼地斟酌着措辞，继续说道。{/n}“那些软弱之人常说，审判官职业生涯的终点不是死亡，就是沦为异端分子。大审判官背负重担的时间比我们任何人都要久，若是我们认为他只会使用纯净派的手段，那恐怕就太天真了。不过，若是我们认为激进派的手段会在某种程度上削弱他对神皇的忠诚，那恐怕就更天真了。关于这个话题，我想说的只有这些。”
languages.original_text: "Emelina used the powers of Chaos to gain the upper hand against xenos. I touched a cogitator built by cultists to learn its secrets. None of us is pure. Xavier..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, and then resumes speaking, now choosing his words with extreme care.{/n} "The craven-hearted say that the career of every Inquisitor ends in either death or heresy. The Lord Inquisitor has borne this burden longer than any of us. It would be naive to think that he had only ever used puritan methods — and even more naive to suggest that such methods have in any way weakened his loyalty to the God-Emperor. And that is all I will say on the subject."

traits.locale_text: “艾米莉娜为了战胜异形，利用了混沌的力量。而我触碰过一台由邪教徒制造的思考器，以获取其中的秘密。我们都不是纯洁之人，至于希维尔……”{n}海因里希犹豫片刻，小心翼翼地斟酌着措辞，继续说道。{/n}“那些软弱之人常说，审判官职业生涯的终点不是死亡，就是沦为异端分子。审判长背负重担的时间比我们任何人都要久，若是我们认为他只会使用纯净派的手段，那恐怕就太天真了。不过，若是我们认为激进派的手段会在某种程度上削弱他对神皇的忠诚，那恐怕就更天真了。关于这个话题，我想说的只有这些。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Emelina s'est servie des pouvoirs du Chaos pour prendre l'ascendant sur les xénos. J'ai touché un cogitateur construit par les cultistes pour découvrir ses secrets. Aucun de nous n'est pur. Xavier... » {n}Heinrix hésite un instant, puis continue en choisissant ses mots avec le plus grand soin.{/n} « Les lâches affirment que la carrière de tout inquisiteur s'achève par la mort ou l'hérésie. Le seigneur inquisiteur porte ce fardeau depuis bien plus longtemps que n'importe lequel d'entre nous. Il serait naïf de croire qu'il n'a jamais utilisé que des méthodes puritaines, et plus naïf encore de suggérer que de telles méthodes ont sapé sa loyauté envers l'Empereur-Dieu. C'est tout ce que je dirai à ce sujet. »
languages.original_text: "Emelina used the powers of Chaos to gain the upper hand against xenos. I touched a cogitator built by cultists to learn its secrets. None of us is pure. Xavier..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, and then resumes speaking, now choosing his words with extreme care.{/n} "The craven-hearted say that the career of every Inquisitor ends in either death or heresy. The Lord Inquisitor has borne this burden longer than any of us. It would be naive to think that he had only ever used puritan methods — and even more naive to suggest that such methods have in any way weakened his loyalty to the God-Emperor. And that is all I will say on the subject."

traits.locale_text: « Emelina s'est servie des pouvoirs du Chaos pour prendre l'ascendant sur les xénos. J'ai touché un cogitateur construit par les cultistes pour découvrir ses secrets. Aucun de nous n'est pur. Xavier... » {n}Heinrix hésite un instant, puis continue en choisissant ses mots avec le plus grand soin.{/n} « Les lâches affirment que la carrière de tout inquisiteur s'achève par la mort ou l'hérésie. Le seigneur inquisiteur porte ce fardeau depuis bien plus longtemps que n'importe lequel d'entre nous. Il serait naïf de croire qu'il n'a jamais utilisé que des méthodes puritaines, et plus naïf encore de suggérer que de telles méthodes ont sapé sa loyauté envers l'Empereur-Dieu. C'est tout ce que je dirai à ce sujet. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Emelina hat die Kräfte des Chaos genutzt, um die Oberhand gegen Xenos zu gewinnen. Ich habe einen von Kultisten gebauten Cogitator berührt, um seine Geheimnisse zu erfahren. Keiner von uns ist pur. Xavier ..." {n}Heinrix zögert. Als er weiterspricht, wählt er seine Worte mit größter Vorsicht.{/n} "Die Ängstlichen sagen, dass die Karriere eines jeden Inquisitors entweder im Tod oder in der Ketzerei endet. Der Großinquisitor hat diese Last länger getragen als jeder andere von uns. Der Glaube, dass er immer nur puritanische Methoden eingesetzt hat, ist naiv. Und noch naiver der Gedanke, dass solche Methoden seine Loyalität gegenüber dem Gottimperator in irgendeiner Weise geschwächt hätten. Und mehr werde ich zu diesem Thema nicht sagen."
languages.original_text: "Emelina used the powers of Chaos to gain the upper hand against xenos. I touched a cogitator built by cultists to learn its secrets. None of us is pure. Xavier..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, and then resumes speaking, now choosing his words with extreme care.{/n} "The craven-hearted say that the career of every Inquisitor ends in either death or heresy. The Lord Inquisitor has borne this burden longer than any of us. It would be naive to think that he had only ever used puritan methods — and even more naive to suggest that such methods have in any way weakened his loyalty to the God-Emperor. And that is all I will say on the subject."

Keiner von uns ist pur. Xavier ..." {n}Heinrix zögert. Als er weiterspricht, wählt er seine Worte mit größter Vorsicht.{/n} "Die Ängstlichen sagen, dass die Karriere eines jeden Inquisitors entweder im Tod oder in der Ketzerei endet. Der Großinquisitor hat diese Last länger getragen als jeder andere von uns. Der Glaube, dass er immer nur puritanische Methoden eingesetzt hat, ist naiv. Und noch naiver der Gedanke, dass solche Methoden seine Loyalität gegenüber dem Gottimperator in irgendeiner Weise geschwächt hätten. Und mehr werde ich zu diesem Thema nicht sagen."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.original_text: "Emelina used the powers of Chaos to gain the upper hand against xenos. I touched a cogitator built by cultists to learn its secrets. None of us is pure. Xavier..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, and then resumes speaking, now choosing his words with extreme care.{/n} "The craven-hearted say that the career of every Inquisitor ends in either death or heresy. The Lord Inquisitor has borne this burden longer than any of us. It would be naive to think that he had only ever used puritan methods — and even more naive to suggest that such methods have in any way weakened his loyalty to the God-Emperor. And that is all I will say on the subject."

languages.text: "Emelina, zenolara üstün gelmek için Kaos güçlerini kullandı. Ben, sırlarını öğrenmek için tarikatçıların kavramsayarına dokundum. Hiçbirimiz temiz değiliz. Xavier..." {n}Heinrix duraksıyor, kelimelerini çok dikkatli seçerek devam ediyor.{/n} "Yüreksizlere göre her Engizisyoncu'nun sonu ya ölümdür ya da kâfirliktir. Lord Engizisyoncu, bu yükü hepimizden uzun zamandır taşıyor. Yalnızca püriten yollara başvurduğunu düşünmek saflık olur... Gelgelelim başvurduğu yolların Tanrı İmparator'a olan sadakatini zayıflattığını söylemekse saflığın dik âlâsı olur. Bu hususta söyleyeceklerim bu kadar."
languages.original_text: "Emelina used the powers of Chaos to gain the upper hand against xenos. I touched a cogitator built by cultists to learn its secrets. None of us is pure. Xavier..." {n}Heinrix hesitates, and then resumes speaking, now choosing his words with extreme care.{/n} "The craven-hearted say that the career of every Inquisitor ends in either death or heresy. The Lord Inquisitor has borne this burden longer than any of us. It would be naive to think that he had only ever used puritan methods — and even more naive to suggest that such methods have in any way weakened his loyalty to the God-Emperor. And that is all I will say on the subject."

traits.locale_text: "Emelina, zenolara üstün gelmek için Kaos güçlerini kullandı. Ben, sırlarını öğrenmek için tarikatçıların kavramsayarına dokundum. Hiçbirimiz temiz değiliz. Xavier..." {n}Heinrix duraksıyor, kelimelerini çok dikkatli seçerek devam ediyor.{/n} "Yüreksizlere göre her Engizisyoncu'nun sonu ya ölümdür ya da kâfir olmak. Lord Engizisyoncu, bu yükü hepimizden uzun zamandır taşıyor. Yalnızca püriten yollara başvurduğunu düşünmek saflık olur... Ancak başvurduğu yolların Tanrı İmparator'a olan sadakatini zayıflattığını söylemek saflığın dik âlâsı olur. Bu hususta söyleyeceklerim bu kadar."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
